itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Steel Dagger
item.desc: A sharp dagger made of steel.

item.name: Ultimate Steel Dagger
item.desc: A Steel Dagger developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Steel Dagger of Crimson Flame, Steel Dagger of Destruction, Steel Dagger of Temptation, Steel Dagger

item.name: Steel Dagger of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Steel Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Steel Dagger of Temptation, Steel Dagger

item.name: Steel Dagger of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Steel Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Steel Dagger of Destruction, Steel Dagger

item.name: Steel Dagger of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Steel Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Steel Dagger of Crimson Flame, Steel Dagger
